attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of this configuration update request.

attributes.name: timestampUTC
attributes.description: UTC time when the request originated

attributes.name: configPath
attributes.description: Full path of the configuration update target, typically /$solution-name/config

attributes.name: updateNow
attributes.description: If this Configuration update should be applied immediately, values are either true or false

attributes.name: futureUpdateTime
attributes.description: UTC String identifying a future time when the configuration update should be performed

attributes.name: configJSONDelta
attributes.description: Properly escaped JSON snippet containing the config attributes and values that are to be updated
